dcterms:creator: Y. Qian
Y. Qian
dcterms:description: The Urban dataset consists of hyperspectral images with a pixel resolution of 307 × 307, containing four constituent materials: Asphalt, Grass, Tree, and Roof. Several channels were removed due to water-vapor absorption and atmospheric effects.
dcterms:title: Urban Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Zhu
F. Zhu
dcterms:description: The Samson dataset is generated by the SAMSON sensor and contains 156 channels covering the spectral range from 0.4 to 0.9µm. A subimage of 95 × 95 pixels is used, containing three material types: Soil, Tree, and Water.
dcterms:title: Samson Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Zhu
F. Zhu
dcterms:description: The Jasper Ridge dataset is captured by the AVIRIS sensor and consists of a subimage of 100 × 100 pixels. It includes channels that are discarded due to atmospheric effects and contains four materials: Tree, Water, Soil, and Road.
dcterms:title: Jasper Ridge Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. A. Kruse
F. A. Kruse
dcterms:description: The Cuprite dataset is captured with the AVIRIS over Cuprite, Nevada, and has 188 spectral reflectance bands covering the wavelength range from 0.4 to 2.5 µm. It includes 12 unique mineral spectral signatures.
dcterms:title: Cuprite Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Holzwarth
S. Holzwarth
dcterms:description: The University of Pavia dataset is recorded by the ROSIS sensor over Pavia, Italy, with 103 spectral bands. It comprises 9 labeled classes covering different man-made structures and natural objects.
dcterms:title: University of Pavia Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Gader
P. Gader
dcterms:description: The Mississippi Gulfport dataset contains hyperspectral and lidar airborne data collected from the University of Southern Mississippi's Gulfpark Campus. It includes 64 spectral reflectance bands covering the wavelength range from 0.368 to 1.043 µm.
dcterms:title: Mississippi Gulfport Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Qian
Y. Qian
dcterms:description: The Spheric dataset is a synthetic dataset from the IC Synthetic Hyperspectral Collections, used to simulate non-linear cases for hyperspectral unmixing.
dcterms:title: Spheric Dataset
